name: TGEN Template Generator for TNEW
author: Lehel Mátyus

sections.description:
TGEN is the Template Generator for Tessitura – TN Express Web aka. TNEW.
This plugin generates a TNEW template from your existing WordPress Website. Once the template is generated you can simply direct your TNEW instance to use the newly generated template.

TGEN is not affiliated with the Tessitura Network. It was independently created to help museums and other art institutions to translate their existing WordPress themes to their TNEW website to better user experience and navigation between their website and ticketing platform.

Features

  • Generates a TNEW template from your website
  • Converts a special WordPress source page into TNEW with a menu and footer that you have control over
  • Allows for customization via custom CSS
  • Update and regenerate the template files as many times you like.

Get started with Premium Support

  • Get the Premium version
  • Feel free contact us directly at the lehelmatyus.com contact page

Getting Started

  1. Once Plugin has been installed and activated
  2. Navigate to Settings -> TGEN Template Generator
  3. Feel Free to modify the default Settings
  4. Hit the Generate button
  5. Click the preview link to get a feel where the TNEW content will be placed
  6. Provide the template file URL to your Tessitura contact so they direct your TNEW website to consume the new templat file
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. Log in to your WordPress dashboard, go to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

Type “Terms Popup On User Login” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found this plugin you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

To manually install the plugin downloading the plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP client application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

  1. Upload tgen-template-generator to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Hov can I generate a different menu

TGEN generates the template from a specific page you select. As long as you can have that specific page load the menu you would like on your TNEW website and not on your WordPress website you are set. Make sure that the selected source page has all the components you would like on the TNEW website as it will be copied there.
If you would like to hire a TGEN developer to set this up for you feel free to reach out at lehelmatyus.com contact page](https://www.lehelmatyus.com/contact)

The content on TNEW is too wide or too narrow

Make sure that the page you select as a source page
